meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christina Pulawski Markus Kolic Chandreyi Ghosh Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7199.

div.div: Alex uses a cane during the closing credits chat.

td.p: Christina Pulawski, a fund raising professional and consultant from Chicago, Illinois
Markus Kolic, a data base devloper and stay-at-home dad from Dighton, Massachusetts
Chandreyi Ghosh, a housewife from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $34,401)

tr.td: FOUND IN GERMANY
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that can be made up of the letters that you will find in "Germany".)
BANKING
GOING STRAIGHT
WINE, WOMEN & SONG
COMPLETES THE NONFICTION TITLE
(Alex: And finally, because it's Christmas Eve...)
"SANTA" GOES AROUND THE WORLD

tr.td: Chandreyi
Markus
Christina
DUDE, WHERE'S MY STAR?
COLORFUL HISTORY
CAN I GET A WITNESS?
BIG IDEAS
AT THE "END"
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those three letters.)
VAN THE MAN
